Luhrman je končno našel še Priscillo
Naslednje leto biografska drama o kralju rock‘n‘rolla. V glavnih vlogah bosta Austin Butler in Olivia DeJonge.
03 Nov 2019, 17:31 by E. B.



Mlada Avstralka je pred velikim izzivom.



Je strasten kakor Elvis. FOTOGRAFIJI: Reuters


Baz Luhrman je pri svojem delu izjemno temeljit, sistematičen in preudaren, ga hvalijo, zato so njegovi projekti dolgotrajni, sodelavci pa nadvse predani in rezultati izjemni. In tudi izbira ekipe poteka počasi, odločitve o zasedbi tako ne padejo čez noč. Dolgo je iskal igralca za glavno vlogo, še dlje je trajalo iskanje ljubezni osrednjega junaka, a kot kaže, jo je Luhrman končno našel. V biografskem filmu o kralju rock'n'rolla se bo kot Priscilla Presley izkazala mlada Olivia DeJonge.
Inovativen pristop
Režiser jo opisuje kot izjemno nadarjeno igralko, ki je sposobna prikazati kompleksno globino in držo, zaradi katerih je Priscilla Presley postala svojevrstna ikona, je svojo odločitev pojasnil Luhrman, ki se je skupaj s Craigom Pearceom podpisal tudi pod scenarij. In ker ima Avstralec glavno besedo pri ustvarjalnem procesu, gre pričakovati svež in inovativen pristop ter povsem unikatno biografsko dramo, v kateri bo v ospredju kompleksen odnos med mladim glasbenikom ter izkušenim in nepopustljivim glasbenim menedžerjem, ki ga bo upodobil dvakratni oskarjevec in eden najuspešnejših igralcev vseh časov, Tom Hanks. V prvem delu filma se bodo posvetili zvezdnikovemu vzponu, v drugem delu pa bo predstavljeno naporno obdobje po Elvisovem 35. letu.
2021.bo težko pričakovana premiera.
Kot smo že pisali, se bo v kralja rock'n'rolla prelevil mladi Američan Austin Butler, ki je Luhrmana prepričal po zahtevnih avdicijah. Butler je navdušil že na Broadwayu, ne gre pa niti zanemariti, da je 27-letnik po videzu precej podoben ikoničnemu glasbeniku. V boju za laskavo vlogo je premagal izjemnega Milesa Tellerja in priljubljenega Harryja Stilesa, Butler pa je očaral tudi s plesnimi sposobnostmi, fleksibilnim in donečim glasom ter izjemno strastjo, ki jo je utelešal Presley in s katero je kralj osvajal srca oboževalk po vsem svetu. In tudi svojo Priscillo, v katero se bo prelevila le malo izkušena, a izjemno nadarjena Avstralka Olivia, ki se je do zdaj izkazala le v nekaj skromnih filmskih vlogah in serijah. Spomnimo, svojo bodočo ženo je Elvis spoznal, ko je bil kot vojak za dve leti vpoklican v Nemčijo. Par se je poročil leta 1967, ločila sta se 1973., v turbulentnem zakonu se jima je rodila hči Lisa Marie. Film, ki nastaja v produkciji Warner Bros., bo na sporedu oktobra 2021.

Luhrman finally found Priscilla
Next summer a biopic about the king of rock'n'roll. Starring Austin Butler and Olivia DeJonge.
03 Nov 2019, 17:31 by E. B.



The young Australian is facing a great challenge.



He's as passionate as Elvis. PHOTOS: Reuters


Baz Luhrman is extremely thorough, systematic and discerning in his work, praising him, which is why his projects are time consuming and his colleagues are very dedicated and the results are outstanding. And the selection of the team is slow, and the decisions about the lineup do not fall overnight. It took him a long time to find the actor for the lead role, the longer it took to find the love of the central character, but it seems Luhrman finally found her. In the biopic about the rock 'n' roll king, young Olivia DeJonge will appear as Priscilla Presley.
An innovative approach
The director describes her as an extremely talented actress, capable of displaying the complex depth and posture that made Priscilla Presley an iconic character, Luhrman explained, who co-wrote with Craig Pearce. And since the Australian is at the forefront of the creative process, a fresh and innovative approach and a completely unique biographical drama is to be expected, which will focus on a complex relationship between a young musician and an experienced and relentless music manager, portrayed by a two-time Oscar winner and one of the most successful actors times, Tom Hanks. The first part of the film will focus on the star's ascent, and the second part will present the grueling period after Elvis' 35th year.
2021.the hardly-anticipated premiere.
As we wrote earlier, young American Austin Butler will turn into the rock 'n' roll king who convinced Luhrman after challenging auditions. Butler has already impressed on Broadway, and one should not neglect that the 27-year-old looks quite similar to the iconic musician. In the fight for a flattering role, he defeated the remarkable Miles Teller and the popular Harry Stiles, but Butler also captivated with his dancing skills, flexible and resonant voice, and the extraordinary passion embodied by Presley, with which the King won the hearts of fans around the world. And also her own Priscilla, into which only a little experienced but extremely talented Australian Olivia, who has shown herself in only a few modest movie roles and series, will be transformed. Recall that his future wife Elvis met when he was called up to Germany for two years. The couple married in 1967, divorced in 1973, and were born in a turbulent marriage to their daughter, Lisa Marie. The movie, which is produced by Warner Bros., will air in October 2021.
